name: Planet Divers
description:
Planet Divers 

is a 3D planet-based third-person adventure that takes mechanics and loops from casual farming simulations and combines them into a unique experience.

Credits 

  •  Til Müller - Game Design, 3D, Texture Artist 
  •  Yannik Hupfer - Programming 
  • Juliane Heinrich - Concept Art, UI, 2D 
  •  Alex Keidel - Programming, Sound Art 
  •  Florian Briese - Concept Art, 3D 
  •  Steven Eshemokhai - Animation, Concept Art, Material Artist
How does your game fit the themes? 

 Shipwrecked

Game Engine 

Unreal Engine 4
